document_data.name: Detect Life
document_data.mainbody: '''''Detect life''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: This spell gave a shugenja the ability to determine if a creature was alive. It was cast on a creature in a coma, trance or unconscious. The spell was able to detect life even if the creature was under a ''[[feign death]]'' spell. Mental protections prevented the spell from functioning, as well as metal of any thickness.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], the holy symbol of a shugenja.
